title: Howlers, iconic Pittsburgh music venue, closes early amid COVID-19 pandemic
text: Coe said plans are still in place for Howlers to open in East Liberty at a future date but couldn’t say exactly when. She said a lease has been secured for the spot of Howlers’ new home, but she is not ready to disclose the specific location just yet.
authors: Cox Media Group National Content Desk
meta_description: Howlers, a popular spot for live music in Pittsburgh, is closing its Bloomfield location amid the COVID-19 pandemic.
